--0-2044406400-1054614506=:47913
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

: : Kup : :

Kup arrived at the Ark, only to see the mighty Autobot starships automated defenses come online.

He transformes to robot mode, drawing his plasma rifle from subspace. Kup tries to remember his old identification from the era that the Ark was bult in order to shut it down.

Kup: Ark, computer interface. Identification: Autobot Military Academy Commedant, Iacon City Security Chief, Kup. Authorization security code: Kup-47-alpha-tango.

Kup hoped that his old security clearance would work and shut down the defenses.


Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:
Quickly, as he saw he had no time to dodge the shots fired at him,
Yggdrasil drew his shield up from his back and tried to block as best
as he could.

Yggdrasil: Kup! Try to do the speech part because I'll just kill them!

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> As they neared the Ark, Teletran's defenses fired up. Detecting the
group 
> nearby.
> 
> First an alert went to Maxima, then the defense batteries - 2
turrets - at 
> the end of the Ark - appeared & prepared for the intruders. A tough
shield 
> however appeared around the command room/bridge.
> 
> A quick alert rang throughout the Ark, then went silent but the
lights still 
> flashed.
